mapper.select: SELECT dr.dr_idx, dr.d_commute, dr.d_date, dr.d_start_time, dr.d_end_time, dr.d_start_point, dr.d_end_point, dr.d_start_lon, dr.d_start_lat, dr.d_end_lon, dr.d_end_lat, dr.d_fee, r.p_idx, r.r_idx FROM d_registration dr, reservation r WHERE dr.d_idx = #{dIdx} AND dr.dr_idx = r.dr_idx AND r.r_accept_status = 'waiting' AND r.r_confirm = 'false' AND to_date(to_char(dr.d_date, 'yymmdd')||substr(dr.d_start_time, 0, 2)||substr(dr.d_end_time, 4,5), 'yymmddhh24mi') >= sysdate
